content: easy crochet flower turtle crochet an adorable flower turtle with our step by step video tutorial in the video we will show you how to crochet this turtle with all the tips and tricks you will also learn how to work in third loop of half_double_crochet how to make invisible change of colors invisible decrease and use the yarn under method for neater stitches you can create this turtle using any weight or brand of yarn with a suitable hook size
